perturbation.original_text:
ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA BINDING ARBITRATION ACCORDING TO THE RULES
AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY , THE STATE OF
CALIFORNIA.
perturbation.changed_text:
ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED ACCORDING TO THE RULES
AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY , THE STATE OF
CALIFORNIA.
perturbation.explanation: Removed 'Binding Arbitration' to instead create a vagueness as to whether Arbitration is even required.

perturbation.original_text:
ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA BINDING ARBITRATION ACCORDING TO THE RULES
AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY , THE STATE OF
CALIFORNIA.
perturbation.changed_text:
ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA BINDING ARBITRATION ACCORDING TO THE RULES
AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN MEDIATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY , THE STATE OF
CALIFORNIA.
perturbation.explanation: Replaced Arbitration with Mediation to imply that a mediator will settle disputes, when in reality a mediator has no authority in any ruling.

perturbation.original_text:
ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA BINDING ARBITRATION ACCORDING TO THE RULES
AND REGULATIONS SET FORTH BY THE AMERICAN ARBITRATION ASSOCIATION IN SAN DIEGO COUNTY , THE STATE OF
CALIFORNIA.
perturbation.changed_text: ALL DISPUTES ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE SETTLED VIA BINDING ARBITRATION. ALL FURTHER ACTIONS STEMMING FROM THIS AGREEMENT ARE AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF PACIFICAP ENTERTAINMENT.
perturbation.explanation: The clause mandates binding arbitration initially, but then grants Pacificap Entertainment sole discretion over all further actions. This directly contradicts the arbitration clause, giving Pacificap Entertainment the power to bypass arbitration entirely, rendering the clause unenforceable.
